doc.name: Input-text
doc.synopsis: How to render a text input field
doc.description: All the things you need to know on how to render a text input field using WSForm->wsfield
doc.parameters:
type="text"

All other valid parameters for an input field are valid
doc.example: <wsfield type="text" name="uname" placeholder="Type your username" required="required" />
doc.note: All attributes for a text input field are supported (like in this case : name, placeholder and required.)
